Bash(DDC_WEB_PORT=5001 python3 -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''/Volumes/appdata/dockerdiscordcontrol'')
from services.web.mech_music_service import get_mech_music_service, MechMusicRequest
service = get_mech_music_service()
service.music_cache = {}  # Clear cache
request_obj = MechMusicRequest(level=3)
result = service.get_mech_music(request_obj)
if result.success:
    import os
    filename = os.path.basename(result.file_path)
    print(f''✅ Level 3 updated: ""{result.title}"" -> File: {filename}'')
else:
    print(f''❌ Error: {result.error}'')
")
